basic.description:
This introductory course provides first-year students with a selection of key skills and theories from across a number of disciplines (History, Sociology, Geography, Film and Media) that will allow them to engage with their further studies and their role in a globalised environment with confidence, intelligence and ambition.
NOTE    This is a mandatory course for students in the First-Year Program at the Bader International Study Centre
LEARNING HOURS    152.4 (14.4L;12S;6Pc;6G;42Oc;72P)
basic.subject: BISC
basic.title: Thinking Locally

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from BISC100;FILM106
